languages.text: Великий суд Инцендии Чорда и зверства ее исповедальных патрулей истощили Футфол. Рабочих на станции стало не хватать, а среди тех, что пережили религиозные чистки, немногие выдерживали возросшие нагрузки. Без тронов от хладного торга станция пришла в упадок, и на Футфоле настала эпоха праведности, голода и превозмогания.

The Great Judgement of Incendia Chorda and the atrocities committed by her confessional units bled Footfall dry. The station soon faced a labour shortage, and few survivors of the religious purges could handle the increased workloads. Without thrones from the Cold Trade, the station fell into decay. Footfall entered an era of piety, hunger, and hardship.
languages.original_text: Великий суд Инцендии Чорда и зверства ее исповедальных патрулей истощили Футфол. Рабочих на станции стало не хватать, а среди тех, что пережили религиозные чистки, немногие выдерживали возросшие нагрузки. Без тронов от хладного торга станция пришла в упадок, и на Футфоле настала эпоха праведности, голода и превозмогания.

traits.locale_text: Grand Judgment of Incendia Chorda and atrocities committed by her confessional units bled Footfall dry. The station encountered a shortage of workforce. Few of those, who survived religious purges, could handle increased workloads. Without thrones from Cold Trade, the station fell into decay. Footfall entered the era of piety, hunger, and hardship.

Grand Judgment of Incendia Chorda and atrocities committed by her confessional units bled Footfall dry. The station encountered a shortage of workforce. Few of those, who survived religious purges, could handle increased workloads. Without thrones from Cold Trade, the station fell into decay. Footfall entered the era of piety, hunger, and hardship.

The Grand Judgment of Incendia Chorda and atrocities committed by her confessional units bled Footfall dry. The station encountered a personnel shortage, and few of those who survived the religious purges could handle the increased workloads. Without thrones from the Cold Trade, the station fell into decay. Footfall entered an era of piety, hunger, and hardship.

Without thrones from the Cold Trade, the station fell into decay. Footfall entered an era of piety, hunger, and hardship.

The station soon faced a labour shortage, and few survivors of the religious purges could handle the increased workloads. Without thrones from the Cold Trade, the station fell into decay. Footfall entered an era of piety, hunger, and hardship.

The Great Judgement of Incendia Chorda and the atrocities committed by her confessional units bled Footfall dry. The station soon faced a labour shortage, and few survivors of the religious purges could handle the increased workloads. Without thrones from the Cold Trade, the station fell into decay. Footfall entered an era of piety, hunger, and hardship.

languages.text: 因森蒂娅·库尔达的大审判，以及她手下执法者的暴行几乎榨干了落脚港。星站遭遇了严重的劳工短缺，在宗教清洗中幸存下来的人们根本无法处理日益增加的工作。没有了冷市贸易带来的收入，落脚港开始日益衰败，步入了人人虔诚但缺衣少食的艰难时代。
languages.original_text: The Great Judgement of Incendia Chorda and the atrocities committed by her confessional units bled Footfall dry. The station soon faced a labour shortage, and few survivors of the religious purges could handle the increased workloads. Without thrones from the Cold Trade, the station fell into decay. Footfall entered an era of piety, hunger, and hardship.

traits.locale_text: 因森蒂娅·库尔达的大审判，以及她手下执法者的暴行几乎榨干了落脚港。星站遭遇了严重的人手短缺，在宗教清洗中幸存下来的人根本无法处理日益增加的工作。没有了冷市贸易带来的收入，落脚港开始日益衰败，步入了人人虔诚但缺衣少食的艰难时代。

languages.text: Das Große Urteil der Incendia Chorda und die Gräueltaten ihrer Beichttrupps ließen Footfall ausbluten. Die Station litt bald unter einem schweren Personalmangel, und von denen, die die religiösen Säuberungen überlebt hatten, konnten nur wenige das erhöhte Pensum stemmen. Ohne Thronmünzen aus dem Kalthandel verfiel die Station. Auf Footfall begann eine Ära der Frömmigkeit, des Hungers und der Not.
languages.original_text: The Great Judgement of Incendia Chorda and the atrocities committed by her confessional units bled Footfall dry. The station soon faced a labour shortage, and few survivors of the religious purges could handle the increased workloads. Without thrones from the Cold Trade, the station fell into decay. Footfall entered an era of piety, hunger, and hardship.

traits.locale_text: Das Große Urteil der Incendia Chorda und die Gräueltaten ihrer Beichttrupps ließen Footfall ausbluten. Die Station litt unter einem schweren Personalmangel, und von denen, die die religiösen Säuberungen überlebt hatten, konnten nur wenige das erhöhte Pensum stemmen. Ohne Thronmünzen aus dem Kalthandel verfiel die Station. Auf Footfall begann eine Ära der Frömmigkeit, des Hungers und der Not.

languages.text: Le grand jugement d'Incendia Chorda et les atrocités commises par ses unités de confession laissèrent Castel exsangue. Peu de ceux qui avaient survécu aux purges religieuses pouvaient assurer le travail supplémentaire engendré par la pénurie de personnel. Sans les trônes rapportés par le Commerce Froid, la station se mit à péricliter et entra dans une période de piété, de faim et de difficulté.
languages.original_text: The Great Judgement of Incendia Chorda and the atrocities committed by her confessional units bled Footfall dry. The station soon faced a labour shortage, and few survivors of the religious purges could handle the increased workloads. Without thrones from the Cold Trade, the station fell into decay. Footfall entered an era of piety, hunger, and hardship.

traits.locale_text: Le grand jugement d'Incendia Chorda et les atrocités commises par ses unités de confession laissèrent Castel exsangue. Peu de ceux qui avaient survécu aux purges religieuses pouvaient assurer le travail supplémentaire engendré par la pénurie de personnel. Sans les trônes rapportés par le Commerce Froid, la station se mit à péricliter et entra dans une période de piété, de faim et de difficulté.

languages.text: El Gran Juicio de Incendia Chorda y las atrocidades que cometían sus unidades confesionales desangraron Paso. La estación pronto se enfrentó a una falta de trabajadores, y pocos de los supervivientes a las purgas religiosas eran capaces de completar su nueva carga de trabajo. Sin los tronos del Comercio Frío, la estación empezó a decaer. Paso entró en una era de piedad, hambre y adversidades.
languages.original_text: The Great Judgement of Incendia Chorda and the atrocities committed by her confessional units bled Footfall dry. The station soon faced a labour shortage, and few survivors of the religious purges could handle the increased workloads. Without thrones from the Cold Trade, the station fell into decay. Footfall entered an era of piety, hunger, and hardship.

traits.locale_text: El Gran Juicio de Incendia Chorda y las atrocidades que cometían sus unidades confesionales desangraron Paso. La estación se enfrentó a una falta de trabajadores, y pocos de los supervivientes a las purgas religiosas eran capaces de completar su nueva carga de trabajo. Sin los tronos del Comercio Frío, la estación empezó a decaer. Paso entró en una era de piedad, hambre y adversidades.

languages.text: インセンディア・チョーダの偉大なる審判と、彼女の懺悔部隊が犯した残虐行為がフットフォールを血祭りにあげた。ステーションは人員不足に陥り、宗教的粛清を生き延びた数名の中に、増加した仕事量に対応できる者はほとんどいなかった。闇取引によって王座も失われ、ステーションは衰退の一途をたどった。フットフォールは敬虔、飢餓、苦難の時代に突入した。
languages.original_text: The Great Judgement of Incendia Chorda and the atrocities committed by her confessional units bled Footfall dry. The station soon faced a labour shortage, and few survivors of the religious purges could handle the increased workloads. Without thrones from the Cold Trade, the station fell into decay. Footfall entered an era of piety, hunger, and hardship.

traits.locale_text: インセンディア・チョーダの偉大なる審判と、彼女の懺悔部隊が犯した残虐行為がフットフォールを血祭りにあげた。ステーションは人員不足に陥り、宗教的粛清を生き延びた数名の中に、増加した仕事量に対応できる者はほとんどいなかった。闇取引によって王座も失われ、ステーションは衰退の一途をたどった。フットフォールは敬虔、飢餓、苦難の時代に突入した。

languages.text: İncendia Chorda'nın Yüce Hükmü ve günah çıkarma birimlerinin işlediği suçlar, Binliman'ın iliğini kemiğini kuruttu. İstasyon, kısa süre içinde iş gücü sıkıntısı yaşamaya başladı. Dinî arındırmalardan sağ çıkan az sayıda kişi, artan işlerle ilgilendi. Soğuk Ticaret'ten gelen geltler olmayınca durum kötüleşti. Binliman; takva, açlık ve güçlük dönemine girdi.
languages.original_text: The Great Judgement of Incendia Chorda and the atrocities committed by her confessional units bled Footfall dry. The station soon faced a labour shortage, and few survivors of the religious purges could handle the increased workloads. Without thrones from the Cold Trade, the station fell into decay. Footfall entered an era of piety, hunger, and hardship.

traits.locale_text: İncendia Chorda'nın Büyük Hüküm'ü ve günah çıkarma birimlerinin işlediği suçlar, Binliman'ın iliğini kemiğini kuruttu. İstasyon kısa süre içinde iş gücü sıkıntısı yaşamaya başladı ve artan işlerle, dinî arındırmalardan hayatta kalan az sayıda kişi ilgilendi. Soğuk Ticaret'ten gelen geltler olmayınca istasyon çürümeye başladı. Binliman bir takva, açlık ve güçlük dönemine girdi.
